--- alter_table_add_row_deletion_policy.sql
alter table foo add row deletion policy ( older_than ( bar, interval 30 day ))

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &ast.AddRowDeletionPolicy{
    Add:               16,
    RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.RowDeletionPolicy{
      Row:        20,
      ColumnName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 55,
        NameEnd: 58,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      NumDays: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 69,
        ValueEnd: 71,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "30",
      },
      Rparen: 77,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD ROW DELETION POLICY ( OLDER_THAN ( bar, INTERVAL 30 DAY ))
